data.title: bd-j2z: Add error_with_fix macro for agent-friendly error messages
data.description:
Enhances all user-facing errors to include 'To fix:' sections with copy-pasteable commands.

Changes:
- Add error_with_fix!() macro to workspace.rs, status.rs, format.rs, init.rs  
- Update ~20 error sites with recovery guidance
- Format: '{message}\n\nTo fix:\n  {cmd1}\n  {cmd2}'

Examples of improved errors:
- 'Workspace name cannot be empty' → now suggests 'maw ws create <name>'
- 'Workspace already exists' → now suggests 'maw ws destroy' or '--random'
- 'jj workspace list failed' → now suggests 'maw doctor' and 'jj status'

All tests pass. Workspace: frozen-pine
